name: Magna International Inc.
description: Magna International Inc. is a leading global automotive supplier with a comprehensive portfolio of capabilities and products that support the ongoing evolution of the automotive industry. Founded in 1957 and headquartered in Aurora, Ontario, Canada, Magna operates in more than 27 countries and employs approximately 158,000 people. The company specializes in the design, engineering, and manufacturing of automotive systems, modules, and components. Magna's broad product range includes body, chassis, exterior, seating, powertrain, and electronic systems. As the automotive landscape shifts towards electrification, autonomous driving, and connected vehicles, Magna is at the forefront, investing in innovative solutions and technologies that enhance vehicle performance and safety. The company partners with major automakers, delivering a high level of customization and flexibility to meet the unique demands of its clients. Magna's commitment to sustainability is reflected in its practices, focusing on reducing environmental impact and enhancing energy efficiency across its operations. By leveraging its engineering expertise and global reach, Magna aims to drive the future of mobility while maintaining a strong emphasis on quality and customer satisfaction.
